abstract.p: Checkfree Corp sells its securities certificate and accounting software subsidiary to Sungard Data Systems Inc for $20 million (S)

block.p: CHECKFREE CORP., Columbus, Ohio, a provider of electronic commerce services and software, sold its securities certificate and accounting software subsidiary to Sungard Data Systems Inc., Wayne, Pa., for $20 million.
HEWLETT-PACKARD CO., Palo Alto, Calif., has won several contracts with a potential value of $100 million over four years from NASA.
NATIONSBANK CORP., Charlotte, N.C., said it laid off 50 to 55 people in its capital markets unit because the unit was not profitable enough.
LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP., Bethesda, Md., said its Mountaingate unit signed an agreement to buy disk drives from Seagate Technology Inc., Scotts Valley, Calif. Terms were not disclosed.

CHECKFREE CORP., Columbus, Ohio, a provider of electronic commerce services and software, sold its securities certificate and accounting software subsidiary to Sungard Data Systems Inc., Wayne, Pa., for $20 million.
HEWLETT-PACKARD CO., Palo Alto, Calif., has won several contracts with a potential value of $100 million over four years from NASA.
NATIONSBANK CORP., Charlotte, N.C., said it laid off 50 to 55 people in its capital markets unit because the unit was not profitable enough.
LOCKHEED MARTIN CORP., Bethesda, Md., said its Mountaingate unit signed an agreement to buy disk drives from Seagate Technology Inc., Scotts Valley, Calif. Terms were not disclosed.
